app.title: Gemisoku-GUI
app.subtitle: Mario Kart 8 Deluxe Race Result Automatic Acquisition & Analysis Application

config.title: ⚙️ Settings
config.validationError: OBS IP address, port, source name, and Gemini API key are required

scoreSettings.title: ⚙️ Score Settings
scoreSettings.keepScoresHelp: When turned off, scores will be automatically reset when the app starts

overlaySettings.title: 🖥️ Overlay Settings
overlaySettings.showRemainingRacesHelp: When turned off, remaining race count will not be displayed on the overlay

usage.title: 💡 How to Use
usage.steps:
1. Enter and save the settings above
2. Click 'Open Overlay' to open browser
3. Set that URL as OBS browser source
4. Click 'Fetch Race Results' button on the race result screen
